pitch.cc: That was pitch number 15 for Al Alburquerque; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .197 average in the first 15 pitches but they hit .286 off him after that.
Al Alburquerque showed faith in Brayan Pena by throwing that slider in the dirt with a runner on 3rd.
